description: Comprehensive speech-to-text and text-to-speech package powered by Doubao AI with multiple voices and formats.
poll-and-retrieve-the-speech-to-text-res: Poll and retrieve the speech-to-text result using task ID. Supports automatic retry with configurable intervals.
task-id-returned-from-submit-request: Task ID returned from submit request
poll-and-retrieve-the-text-to-speech-aud: Poll and retrieve the text-to-speech audio result using task ID. Supports automatic retry with configurable intervals.
task-id-returned-from-submit-request2: Task ID returned from submit request
url-of-the-generated-audio-file: URL of the generated audio file
submit-an-audio-file-to-doubao-speech-to: Submit an audio file to Doubao Speech-to-Text service and get a task ID for result retrieval
url-of-the-audio-file-to-transcribe: URL of the audio file to transcribe
task-id-for-retrieving-the-transcription: Task ID for retrieving the transcription result
submit-text-to-doubao-text-to-speech-ser: Submit text to Doubao Text-to-Speech service and get a task ID for audio retrieval
text-content-to-convert-to-speech: Text content to convert to speech
task-id-for-retrieving-the-tts-audio-res: Task ID for retrieving the TTS audio result
convert-text-to-speech-using-doubao-tts-: Convert text to speech using Doubao TTS and download the audio file locally. Supports multiple voice options.
text-content-to-convert-to-speech2: Text content to convert to speech
path-of-the-successfully-downloaded-file: Path of the successfully downloaded file
convert-text-to-speech-using-doubao-tts-: Convert text to speech using Doubao TTS and return the audio URL. Supports multiple voice options in Chinese and English.
text-content-to-convert-to-speech3: Text content to convert to speech
url-of-the-generated-audio-file2: URL of the generated audio file
converts-audio-files-to-text-using-douba: Converts audio files to text using Doubao Speech-to-Text API. Takes a local audio file, uploads it to cloud storage, submits it for transcription, and returns both the full transcribed text and word-level timestamps.
local-path-to-the-audio-file-to-be-trans: Local path to the audio file to be transcribed
audio-format-of-the-input-file-e-g-mp3-w: Audio format of the input file (e.g., mp3, wav, m4a, flac)
transcribe-audio-from-url-to-text-using-: Transcribe audio from URL to text using Doubao STT. Directly processes audio files accessible via URL.
url-of-the-audio-file-to-transcribe2: URL of the audio file to transcribe
description2: Comprehensive speech-to-text and text-to-speech package powered by Doubao AI with multiple voices and formats.
output-path-for-saving-the-audio-file: Output path for saving the audio file (defaults to session directory if not specified)
